Audio.Author: Dan Lane
Audio.Comments: Two songs after playback from a male (and female answering first?) perched about 3-5m up in semiarid deciduous scrub (canopy 6-7m).bird-seen:yesplayback-used:yes
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Formicivora melanogaster,Coereba flaveola,Troglodytes aedon,Empidonomus varius,Vanellus chilensis,Euphonia chlorotica
